name: Bonk (itch) (jtech21)
description:
My first game made without exclusively following along with a tutorial. 

Completed for submission to the Finally Finish Something Jam 2021.

Bong is a traditional Ponglike as I felt it would be a good way to get comfortable with unity using a simple game as a place to get started.

If you would like to look at the code for your own purposes or to give me advice the github page is: https://github.com/ImpossiblePolygon/PongLike
